nodes.title: The lockdown weblog
nodes.excerpt: I was on my way down to the common mess at my uni when I read an email stating that our ongoing sports fest has been canceled and the uni is…

nodes.title: Hackathons, the ice cream trucks of the tech industry.
nodes.excerpt: We had 8 crushed cans of Red Bulls, 4 packets of half eaten chips, two pairs of drowsy red eyes and 8 hours left. I hadn’t slept in days and…
nodes.description: A lengthy discourse about hackathons and my experience at GE Healthcare's precision challenge 2019.
